name: Love And War (RiceRogue)
description:
CONTROLS: Click on the choice of hand and drag the helmet/hammer to you or your opponent's head icon. 

Here, the player will act as the partner for the Devil, having to enact in an evil game of slightly violent rock paper scissors for points. Players will combat an AI devil and play rock paper scissors against them. The winner will try to hit the opponent's head by dragging a hammer onto them for bonus points. The loser will, at the same time, attempt to drag a metal helmet onto their head to prevent their opponent from getting bonus points for a hit. 

Be careful, the AI will attempt to attack and defend faster if you are too far ahead in points (by 4)! The first person to get to 13 points wins! 

P.S. Hints will appear if you are losing far behind your opponent (by 4 points).
